text:
(a)     The Adult Probation Department is hereby authorized to collect a fee to cover the actual administrative cost of collecting any victim restitution included in an order of the court. The administrative fee shall be paid in addition to the restitution payment and shall be 10 percent of the amount ordered to be paid to the victim. The proceeds of the fee collection shall be deposited in the general fund for appropriation by the Board of Supervisors. 
(Added by Ord. 222-89, App. 6/22/89)

heading.catch_text: ADULT PROBATION DEPARTMENT - RESTITUTION COLLECTION FEE.
